name: Symbolt: Arenas - GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of The Dice
name_original: Symbolt: Arenas - GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of The Dice
description:
An Arena Shooter with some randomness :D

Controls:

WASD to Move, Space to Jump

Mouse to Look Around, Left Mouse to Fire Weapon

Enter Key/Right Mouse Button to Purchase Coins/Health at the altars

Escape to Activate/Deactivate Menu UI in-game, so that you can return to the main menu.
